messages.message: :wave: hi friends. There’s been a lot of confusion about what options are supported by which OCR models. I’ve started a features matrix that will help us understand what’s available with each model. This will help us a lot with customer communications as well. Could you please take a look and fill in anything you have information about that’s missing? I’m also not confident that the list of options in column A is complete, so please add any you’re aware of that might be missing. Here’s the spreadsheet: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1fu8RupTSzK73W2lOjd3EZLW_2gP-fsvEdsAcRnEe_O0/edit?usp=sharing
Thanks Paul! I think i made something similar to this in the past, it probably wasn't circulated very well though.  I will fill this in
@Aaron Tami oh, if there’s something else already done, let’s use that! Would love to have something that we can all use to save us from having to ask around with questions when they come up.
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Pxu0SUpHy5aVxczotihAnYx7BeyFBokojbumNkb1ZPc/edit#gid=0
this is from last August
oh sweet. so it looks like these track slightly different things (yours has info that the new one does not). If it works for you, I’ll merge yours into this new one
Just wanted to chime in to say - dang, this is awesome! Thank you both for making this.
I think i’ve got the two merged together and filled out the stuff i could figure out
many of the options you list on there are ocr model agnostic
if it’s not true for all the models, can we call out which ones are model specific?
figure it’s easy to put Y across the board for options where it’s immaterial
ya ill fill it in
instead of people having to guess
I don't know what Photo Documents is
haha hopefully someone knows :slightly_smiling_face:
(it’s an option in the model dropdown)
Looks like it corresponds to Tesseract haha
not sure why
lets just delete it
what happens if we delete a model and a customer is using it in a flow?
I mean delete it from the spreadsheet
im also pretty confident no one is using tesseract as its barely implemented
i would rather leave it in and document that it shouldn’t be used
the goal is for us to be able to look up the options listed and understand the implications / options provided by each
we probably could / should think about deprecating some of these now
Its the same thing as the Tesseract column tho
do we have any “deprecation warning” / notification systems in place in the platform if we want to deprecate stuff?
we can combine them in to 1 column
that works, as long as it’s clear to anyone trying to understand what each option means
just merged them
for th e not implemented ones, im just ognna change everything to n/a
that works
When i have some time (likely not til after the next release as im pretty swamped), ill try to do a more in depth write up of all our ocr cfg options
as its pretty confusing what everything does
and when to use it
hopefully we can use this to try to clean them up a bit
that would be amazing
it would be sweet to have this in the official docs somewhere so people can self-serve when building flows
Agreed, very hard to keep up to date though
that can be a problem for our future selves to solve :joy:
(but in all seriousness, people like @Barrie joining will help this quite a lot)
Can we get @Barrie + @Aaron Tami to team up and have this put into our public docs? That’d be awesome!
:thumbsup:
https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/IBG-60 We'll make it happen!

@Aaron Tami @Barrie @paul Can we add this in Tutorials and Guides in Instabase.com (http://Instabase.com) and ship to customers? I have received a feedback from SC saying the documentation does not talk about OCR models and its capabilities.
